item.title: Newport Beach Film Festival Unveils 2025 Lineup: ‘Wake Up Dead Man,’ ‘Sentimental Value,’ ‘Frankenstein’ and More (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: The 26th annual Newport Beach Film Festival (NBFF) has unveiled its lineup for this year’s festival, set to take place from Oct. 16 to Oct. 23. This year’s event will screen over 100 feature films and
